summary: A gritty story of a take-no-prisoners war between dirty cops and an outlaw biker gang. A drug kingpin is driven to desperate measures.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Ed Harris|Milla Jovovich|John Leguizamo|Penn Badgley|Dakota Johnson|Anton Yelchin|Peter Gerety|Kevin Corrigan|Vondie Curtis-Hall|James Ransone|Spencer Treat Clark|Bill Pullman|Delroy Lindo|Harley Ware|Diego Cortez|Mauricio Ovalle|Emerson Ray Rosenthal|Isabelle Link-Levy|Aubrey Pilson|Jack Pilson|India Reed Kotis|Harry Beer|Jorge Marcos|Charly Bivona|Rachel Rossin|Kyle Timlin|Christopher Bizub|Helen Phillips|Mel Slater|Rome Neal|Harriet Parker Mann|Paul Lazar|J.D. title: Guerra total
